## CrmTranscriptExchange interface

Transcript representation of the session. The input/output is an easily readable, simplified representation of the visitor/bot "chat". This is usually emailed or sent to a CRM system or customer service for a quick overview. That is why input an output are strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CrmTranscriptExchange 
```

|  [input](./stentor-models.crmtranscriptexchange.input.md) | string |  |
|  [output](./stentor-models.crmtranscriptexchange.output.md) | string |  |
